body:
I am trying to create a spack package.py for my application that depends on a specific version of gcc.  When it goes to configure, it uses the system install of gcc and not the spack depends_on compiler.  I'm working off of devel spack.  

```
from spack import *
class Foo(CMakePackage):
depends_on('gcc@6.4.0')
```

## other notes
The gcc@6.4.0 I am using was built with at system gcc 8.3.0.  The gcc@6.4.0 is in my compilers.yaml file.
title: Compiling with a specific version of GCC
